title: Global YouTube usage for music consumption 2017 , by country
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 14 number of Countrys.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Country Mexico and lowest at Country Japan.
There is a difference of 25.0 between the maximum Country Mexico and minimum Country Japan.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 14 number of Countrys.
The maximum Share of respondents 97.0 is found at Country Mexico and the minimum is found at Japan where Country is 72.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 14 number of Countrys.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Country Mexico and lowest at Country Japan.
There is a difference of 25.0 between the maximum Country Mexico and minimum Country Japan.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 14 number of Countrys.
Country Mexico has the highest Share of respondents and Japan has the lowest Share of respondents.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Country is 25.0.
Country Mexico is higher than any other Countrys with value 97.0, followed by Brazil, and Spain. Down to Country Japan with the lowest value 72.0.
Country Italy, and Spain share the same value 90.0.
The average Share of respondents in all 14 Countrys is 84.07.
